---
category: news
title: "Didcot self-driving bus starts commute on public roads"
excerpt: "The UK's first fully electric self-driving bus has begun a commuter service on public roads. The Mi-Link bus makes a six-mile (10km) round trip from Didcot Parkway railway station to Milton Park in Oxfordshire. The 15-seat vehicle has been running circuits of the science and technology park since January."
